org.dspace.xmlworkflow.WorkflowConfigurationException

  • Packages that use WorkflowConfigurationException 
    Package Description
    org.dspace.app.rest.repository  
    org.dspace.workflow
    DSpace has a simple workflow system, which models the workflows as named steps: SUBMIT, arbitrary named steps that you define, and ARCHIVE.
    org.dspace.xmlworkflow
    An Item submission begins as a WorkspaceItem in some user's workspace.
    org.dspace.xmlworkflow.factory  
    org.dspace.xmlworkflow.service  
    org.dspace.xmlworkflow.state
    A workflow consists of a sequence of steps.
